prompts: Create a ghost-type Pokemon that embodies nightmares and shadows.
I want a dark-themed Pokemon with a flowing cloak and eerie presence.
Generate a mythical creature that manipulates dreams and fears.
Make a Pokemon with a sleek, shadowy form and glowing eyes.
Imagine a legendary Pokemon that can control the night and dreams.
Design a creature that appears ghostly with a hauntingly beautiful silhouette.
Give me a Pokemon known for its ability to induce sleep and nightmares.
